name: message_default
value:
- Welcome to Charms bot

Bot helps you to dealing with charms, Calculate how much it will cost you, Find out about the latest charms offers available.

name: message_help
value: !charms cost <number> - Show the cost of purchasing charms in Wolf points
!charms point <pints> - Show the amount of Charms you can buy
!charms summary - Show the group's charms stats for the past 24 hours
!charms prices - Send a picture containing all the prices of the charms
!charms levels - Send a picture containing charms by levels
!charms offer <ID> - Show the details of offer by ID

name: message_error_not_number
value: (n) The entry must be a number.

name: message_error_offer_notfound
value: (n) There is no offer with this ID.

name: message_error_number_must_be_multiples_25
value: (n) The number must be a multiple of 25.

name: message_summary
